task.title: Java Fundamentals
task.description: Learn Java syntax, variables, data types, and basic programming concepts

task.title: Object Oriented Programming
task.description: Master classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation

task.title: Collections and Generics
task.description: Explore Java collections framework, generics, and data structures

task.title: Exception Handling
task.description: Learn try-catch blocks, custom exceptions, and error handling best practices
